subtitle: Buchgewerblich-graphische Mustermesse des Deutschen Buchgewerbevereins, Leipzig [...] : Reklame-Messe [...] 31. August bis 6. September 1919.
contributions: Internationale Ausstellung für Buchgewerbe und Graphik (1919 : Leipzig, Germany)
title: Bugra-Messe
subjects: Book industries and trade -- Germany -- Directories

description.value: Directory of names of exhibitors at the 1919 exhibition in Leipzig for German printing and book production trades. Includes names of papermakers, typefoundries, typesetters, engravers, ink makers, book and lithographic printing companies, book binders, graphic art studios, book, art and music publishers, machinery and tool manufacturers for the printing trades and names of German companies involved in the production and promotion of advertising.

notes.value: In: Illustrated advertising cards, booklets, samples, etc., collected at the Leipzig "Messe" expositions from 1917 to 1925, box 1.
